messages.message: @Aayush, is there a document with those hex codes you’re referring to. The violet doesn’t match the violet we’re seeing when we inspect AI Hub elements, and we don’t have hex codes for the other colors (like blue for the note box, etc). We checked Pollen, but I think what we’re seeing there is Instabase colors rather than AI Hub specific colors. cc @alagu
on the top-left of pollen, click *Instabase theme* and select *Instabase beta theme* to get the ai hub colors
so the “violet” is classed as a blue :thinking_face:
I think it maybe because we replaced the old blue or something @Liam Callanan will hv the story :grimacing:
hm, we use purple for one box, and blue for another, but they look pretty similar… maybe we’ll experiment with some other color to replace one of these.
So for “note,” we are trying the AI Hub yellow, so that there’s more distinction between the two notice types. Thoughts?
You know, @alagu, I’ll just bring this to office hours, no reason to worry about this here. Thank you!
That would be best. Thank you!
purple is always the old purple in all current themes whereas blue will be different for each theme. The new theme is based on violet while the old theme uses the original blue
our new color palette has no “purple” so I’d suggest avoiding it
There’s definitely a “purple” listed in the Pollen info for AI Hub, but I take you to mean that we’re not _using_ it. Good to know, and we’ll discuss with the design team.

I meant here: https://www.figma.com/file/7u97Q6qQYBFMdhGnbQ8Vk8/IB-Color-Palette?node-id=1922%3A335&mode=dev

The pollen version keeps purple around since we need it for the main platform & we use it in a few places on the aihub homepage
